mapper.select: select c2.name2, c3.name3, g.status, g.state, g.price, g.sale_complete from game g, category2 c2, category3 c3, game_classification gc where board_idx = #{boardIdx} and gc.category2_idx = c2.idx and gc.category3_idx = c3.idx and g.game_classification_idx = gc.idx
mapper.insert: insert into game (price, board_idx, status, state, game_classification_idx) values (#{price}, LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{status}, #{condition}, #{gameClassificationIdx})
mapper.update: UPDATE game SET price = #{price}, status = #{status}, state = #{condition}, game_classification_idx = #{gameClassificationIdx}, sale_complete = #{saleComplete} WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}

select.if: select idx as category_idx, name, image from category where idx < 4
select idx as category2_idx, category_idx, name2, image from category2 where idx < 5
select idx as category2_idx, category_idx, name2, image from category2 where idx > 4 and idx < 8
select idx as category2_idx, category_idx, name2, image from category2 where idx > 7 and idx < 10

mapper.select:
select b.title, g1.price, g1.board_idx, gc.category3_idx, gc.category2_idx, g1.state, g1.status, g1.sale_complete, b.like_count, b.email, (select full_name from file_list where board_idx = b.idx limit 1) as full_name
from board b, game g1, game_classification gc where b.idx = g1.board_idx and g1.game_classification_idx = gc.idx
from game g1, board b, category2 c2, game_classification gc where b.idx = g1.board_idx and gc.category2_idx = c2.idx and c2.category_idx = #{categoryIdx} and gc.idx = g1.game_classification_idx
from game g1, board b, category2 c2, game_classification gc where b.idx = g1.board_idx and gc.category2_idx = c2.idx and c2.category_idx = #{categoryIdx} and c2.idx = #{category2Idx} and gc.category3_idx = #{category3Idx} and gc.idx = g1.game_classification_idx
order by g1.idx desc
select idx, name2 from category2 where category_idx < 4
select idx as category2_idx, name2 from category2 where idx < 10;
select idx as category3_idx, name3 from category3 order by idx asc

select b.title, g1.price, g1.board_idx, gc.category3_idx, gc.category2_idx, g1.state, g1.status, g1.sale_complete, b.like_count, b.email, (select full_name from file_list where board_idx = b.idx limit 1) as full_name from game g1, board b, category2 c2, game_classification gc where b.idx = g1.board_idx and gc.category2_idx = c2.idx and c2.idx = #{category2Idx} and gc.category3_idx = #{category3Idx} and gc.idx = g1.game_classification_idx order by g1.idx desc
SELECT title FROM game_classification where title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
select idx from game_classification where title = #{title}

select b.title, g1.price, g1.board_idx, gc.category3_idx, gc.category2_idx, g1.state, g1.status, g1.sale_complete, b.like_count, b.email, (select full_name from file_list where board_idx = b.idx limit 1) as full_name from board b, game g1, game_classification gc, user u where b.idx = g1.board_idx and u.idx = b.user_idx and g1.game_classification_idx = gc.idx and ${searchType} like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
